entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 7:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 69 %

Dewpoint: -5.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 after midnight then light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
